dn13:15.1: te vata, vāseṭṭha → teva vāseṭṭha (mr), etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu natthi
dn13:30.5: pariyonaddhā → te (sya-all, mr) | onaddhā → ophuṭā (bj, mr); ophutā (sya-all, pts1ed)
dn13:36.2: āsīditvā → ādisitvā (mr) | visāraṁ → visādaṁ (bj, pts1ed); visattaṁ (sya-all) | sukkhataraṁ → sukkhataraṇaṁ (bj, mr); sukhataraṁ (sya-all)
dn13:43.1: sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro → bhojane mattaññū (bj, mr)
dn13:45.3: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ → pisuṇāvācaṁ (pts1ed) | samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj) | anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts1ed)
dn13:52.2: nāḷikaṁ asiṁ → khaggaṁ (bj, pts1ed); asiṁ khaggaṁ (sya-all, km); khaggaṁ asiṁ (mr)
dn13:53.2: janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ → itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed); itthīkathaṁ purisakathaṁ (sya2ed); itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ kumārakathaṁ kumārikathaṁ (mr)
dn13:70.3: byantiṁ kareyya → byantīkareyya (bj, sya-all, km); vyantikareyya (pts1ed)
dn13:71.5: na ca me → nacassa me (bj, mr)
